I WANNA V1.1

Hey You!

I work with design since 2009 when I started the college. I can create PSD templates I can code the front end of them and I can code the back end too. But I had never made a portifolio. Maybe cause I'm usually focused on finish the current project to start the next one. So I forget to save pictures and informations about works to build them as my portifolio.

I'm here 8 years after (WOW!) to make something like this. Like a portifolio. But different. I'm good to follow patterns I swear! But I'm a designer and I have a taste for the new. So, to show my job I started the PartBee as a responsive reusable HTML components. I build independent parts HTML using frameworks for web pages.

More that show Templates PSD or HTML pages. I will give my intimity as front-end showing and sharing my code that helps to build pages faster.

But things change!

To follow tendencies I rebuild all PartBee using Sass and creating a totaly new CSS framework. This way Bootstrap dependencies was eliminated. I don't think it's completed yet.

Hey! I was a mermaidunicorn (with cyano hair). Now I'm just a human. I'm M. Sc. Computer Science. Actualy 26 years old and living in Palmas-TO, Brazil. Time a lot as front end.
I have feelings for HTML, CSS and JS ‚ô•.

Send me a message and let me know you too!

Using it üöÄ

PartBee now is built in Sass and no dependent of Bootstrap. But it's totally fractionated & can be used besides Bootstrap.

You can use just master.css, or you can compile your version of this changing variables in your way. You can change: alpha, beta, gama, tetha colors to customize the framework colors. You can also remove some parts of PartBee when you want.

https://walmeidaw.github.io/Part-Bee/style/master.css

Can you also try npm module.

npm install partbee
